posts.post_content:
Some very nice T207s for sale. Please add $3 for shipping. Prices assume a no-fee payment method but if you'd like to use Paypal Goods, that is fine. Just add 3%

The Simon in particular is an incredible card.  The lacquer finish is just perfect.  Hard to explain, but if you know T207s, you probably know what I mean.  The scan doesn't do it justice.

Simon $100  
Milan VGEX $40
McBride EX $50
Morgan EX $50
